description: This proposal seeks to construct a suitable route to access the CCG telecom infrastructures at the Natashquan site.",
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Access Road Construction**

**Title:** Design and Construction of Access Roads for Natashquan Telecommunications Infrastructure

**Reference Number:** CB-545-54470052

**Amendment Number:** 6

### General Information

**Solicitation Number:** 30005292
**Publication Date:** 2024-02-06
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2024-02-21, 14:00:00 hours (EST)
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-03-01
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

### Contracting Entity Information

**Contracting Entity:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
**Address:** 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6, Canada
**Contact Person:** Simon Cousineau, simon.cousineau@dfo-mpo.gc.ca, (343) 548-1568

### Tenders and Deliverables

**Tender Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price
**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
**Geographic Scope:**

* Region of Opportunity: Canada
* Region of Delivery: Quebec, excluding the National Capital Region

### Service Description

The Canadian Coast Guard invites tenders for the design and construction of access roads to its telecommunications infrastructure located at Natashquan site. The existing access roads are submerged under water, rendering it difficult for personnel to maintain equipment.

The successful contractor will be required to design the backfill for raising the existing roads and execute the construction work. The contractor will supply the necessary labour, machinery, and materials to complete the work within the specified timeframe.

### Tender Documents

Availability of tender documents can be found on the Canada Buys website. Links to the tender notice and associated documentation are available below:

* [English Site Plan] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31393/30005292---site-plan---plan-du-site.pdf
* [French Site Photos] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31393/30005292---site-photos---photos-du-site_0.pdf
